Project Name: Simple Web Spider
Programming Language: C
Additional Library: w3c-libwww

Advantages:
  * C makes the program fast in execution
  * C programs take less space in memory than php, perl, etc.
  * The 'w3c-libwww' makes the spider robust in crawling pages and extracting
    links.
  * No additional interpreter [like php, perl, python, etc.] needed to be
    installed. Native system's executable is generated after compilation.
  * C is mostly used programming language. Most of the programmers know C.
    However it is upto programmers which programming language they will use.
